title: A Recipe for Anger
description: Petra is baking normally again, but her Sourdough causes customers to erupt in violent arguments. A fistfight broke out. Petra suspects rival baker Gorm of sabotage.

turns.narrative: Two customers are screaming at each other. The moment they stop eating the darker-shaded bread they look confused and embarrassed. The sourdough is a strange deep reddish colour.
turns.choice_a: Calm the customers and assess the scene
turns.consequence_a: They apologise profusely once separated. The darker slice has a metallic smell.
turns.choice_b: Grab the darker bread as evidence immediately
turns.consequence_b: You secure the unusual loaf. It has a faint mineral odour unlike any sourdough you've smelled.

turns.narrative: Boot tracks behind the bakery lead toward Gorm's Bread House. Petra's sourdough starter has red fungal powder in it — Rage-Spore mushrooms.
turns.choice_a: Spy on Gorm's shop to catch him in the act
turns.consequence_a: You observe Gorm mixing red powder into a pouch. He notices you and tries to bolt.
turns.choice_b: Confront Gorm with the boot tracks as evidence
turns.consequence_b: Gorm confesses to buying Rage-Spore mushrooms from a travelling apothecary, not knowing they caused violence.

turns.narrative: Gorm is remorseful. He had been losing customers for months and panicked.
turns.choice_a: Demand Gorm pay Petra three weeks of lost earnings
turns.consequence_a: Gorm pays. Relations remain cold but legally resolved.
turns.choice_b: Propose Gorm and Petra partner on a joint stall
turns.consequence_b: After coaxing, both agree. A combined stall opens to unexpected success.

gorm_partnered.description: Gorm and Petra opened a joint stall.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed quietly. The situation remains unresolved.
